## Bio

Angélica is a PhD student in Health Systems at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health and a Consultant at the World Bank Global Financial Facility. She studies how social determinants constrain the impact of health programs using mixed methods. She frequently collaborates with researchers who study health systems, health economics, gender, and health policy.
